name: BRICK BATTLE (MichaelMonty)
description:
BE SURE TO CLICK ON THE GAME BEFORE STARTING IT

CONCEPT

2 player game of breakout - destroy the other player's bricks!

CONTROLS

Top player moves with A / D keys

Bottom player moves with Left / Right keys

GAME JAM

Made in 3 hours for Trijam 196

Theme: Interference Does Damage

How it fits the theme:  you must intercept the other player's shots to bounce the ball back at them and destroy their bricks. "Interfering" deals damage to your opponent's brick supply (and possibly to your friendship)
